name: Its All in the Twist
description:
Finished Quilt Sizes:
Baby Size:  46"x46"
Lap Size:  52"x64"
Queen Size:  64"x76"

This pattern is designed for quilters of all levels.  A new twist on the traditional garden twist pattern.  Its quick and easy and loads of fun to put together.

name: Ornamental
description:
Finished Size: 34"x34"

This little wall quilt can be made with reverse applique style or even fusible web applique.  It goes together quickly and you might even have it done by Christmas.  I have used the pattern to teach reverse applique at a local quilt shop Orange Quilt Bee, in Orange California.

name: Tic-Tac...Oh!
description:
Finished Quilt Size is 56"x64"

This pattern is designed for quilters of all levels.  It is done in a modified log cabin style approach.  If you are an advanced quilter there are some suggestions that can give you that extra challenge that you love.  If you are a beginning quilter, simply follow the diagrams.

name: Kindle Cover Coverlet
description:
This pattern contains instructions for fabric covers that fit nicely over the leather covers that your kindle lives in.  Adjustments can be easily made for other specialty Kindle cover, e-books or regular books.

I love my kindle!  I spend almost as much time reading as I do Quilting.  Ok maybe not, but I did notice that the leather cover was starting to show wear.  Also, my Kindle Edition 1 kept falling out of the cover and hitting me in the nose, bonk!  So my mother, gave me the idea to make covers for our covers.  We have since made several for ourselves and as gifts and are often asked for the pattern.
